testcase.name: Customer Register sucessfully and verify customer is able to send the email
testcase.system-out: Given customer loads the URL in browser.....................................passed When customer clicks on signup button.......................................passed And enters "sankara", "mahadeva", "sankara.maha@gmail.com", "sankara.maha" and "passw0rd".passed And clicks on register button...............................................passed Then validate the message...................................................passed Then clicks on Home.........................................................passed And Validate "sankara.maha@gmail.com" email from profile section............passed And create email and send to "naveen".......................................passed And Validate the message "The message has been sent to naveen naveen (naveen)".passed
